3769 /*
3770 ====================
3771 RE_RegisterShaderNoMip
3772 
3773 For menu graphics that should never be picmiped
3774 ====================
3775 */
3776 qhandle_t RE_RegisterShaderNoMip( const char *name ) {
3777  shader_t *sh;
3778 
3779  if ( strlen( name ) >= MAX_QPATH ) {
3780  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "Shader name exceeds MAX_QPATH\n" );
3781  return 0;
3782  }
3783 
3784  sh = R_FindShader( name, LIGHTMAP_2D, qfalse );
3785 
3786  // we want to return 0 if the shader failed to
3787  // load for some reason, but R_FindShader should
3788  // still keep a name allocated for it, so if
3789  // something calls RE_RegisterShader again with
3790  // the same name, we don't try looking for it again
3791  if ( sh->defaultShader ) {
3792  return 0;
3793  }
3794 
3795  return sh->index;
3796 }
3797 
3798 /*
3799 ====================
3800 R_GetShaderByHandle
3801 
3802 When a handle is passed in by another module, this range checks
3803 it and returns a valid (possibly default) shader_t to be used internally.
3804 ====================
3805 */
3806 shader_t *R_GetShaderByHandle( qhandle_t hShader ) {
3807  if ( hShader < 0 ) {
3808  ri.Printf( PRINT_WARNING, "R_GetShaderByHandle: out of range hShader '%d'\n", hShader );
3809  return tr.defaultShader;
3810  }
3811  if ( hShader >= tr.numShaders ) {
3812  ri.Printf( PRINT_WARNING, "R_GetShaderByHandle: out of range hShader '%d'\n", hShader );
3813  return tr.defaultShader;
3814  }
3815  return tr.shaders[hShader];
3816 }
3817 
3818 /*
3819 ===============
3820 R_ShaderList_f
3821 
3822 Dump information on all valid shaders to the console
3823 A second parameter will cause it to print in sorted order
3824 ===============
3825 */
3826 void R_ShaderList_f (void) {
3827  int i;
3828  int count;
3829  shader_t *shader;
3830 
3831  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, "-----------------------\n");
3832 
3833  count = 0;
3834  for ( i = 0 ; i < tr.numShaders ; i++ ) {
3835  if ( ri.Cmd_Argc() > 1 ) {
3836  shader = tr.sortedShaders[i];
3837  } else {
3838  shader = tr.shaders[i];
3839  }
3840 
3841  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "%i ", shader->numUnfoggedPasses );
3842 
3843  if (shader->lightmapIndex >= 0 ) {
3844  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, "L ");
3845  } else {
3846  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, " ");
3847  }
3848  if ( shader->multitextureEnv == GL_ADD ) {
3849  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "MT(a) " );
3850  } else if ( shader->multitextureEnv == GL_MODULATE ) {
3851  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "MT(m) " );
3852  } else if ( shader->multitextureEnv == GL_DECAL ) {
3853  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "MT(d) " );
3854  } else {
3855  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, " " );
3856  }
3857  if ( shader->explicitlyDefined ) {
3858  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "E " );
3859  } else {
3860  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, " " );
3861  }
3862 
3863  if ( shader->optimalStageIteratorFunc == RB_StageIteratorGeneric ) {
3864  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "gen " );
3865  } else if ( shader->optimalStageIteratorFunc == RB_StageIteratorSky ) {
3866  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "sky " );
3867  } else if ( shader->optimalStageIteratorFunc == RB_StageIteratorLightmappedMultitexture ) {
3868  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "lmmt" );
3869  } else if ( shader->optimalStageIteratorFunc == RB_StageIteratorVertexLitTexture ) {
3870  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, "vlt " );
3871  } else {
3872  ri.Printf( PRINT_ALL, " " );
3873  }
3874 
3875  if ( shader->defaultShader ) {
3876  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, ": %s (DEFAULTED)\n", shader->name);
3877  } else {
3878  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, ": %s\n", shader->name);
3879  }
3880  count++;
3881  }
3882  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, "%i total shaders\n", count);
3883  ri.Printf (PRINT_ALL, "------------------\n");
3884 }
3885 
3886 /*
3887 ====================
3888 ScanAndLoadShaderFiles
3889 
3890 Finds and loads all .shader files, combining them into
3891 a single large text block that can be scanned for shader names
3892 =====================
3893 */
3894 #define MAX_SHADER_FILES 4096
3895 static void ScanAndLoadShaderFiles( void )
3896 {
3897  char **shaderFiles;
3898  char *buffers[MAX_SHADER_FILES];
3899  char *p;
3900  int numShaderFiles;
3901  int i;
3902  char *oldp, *token, *hashMem, *textEnd;
3903  int shaderTextHashTableSizes[MAX_SHADERTEXT_HASH], hash, size;
3904 
3905  long sum = 0, summand;
3906  // scan for shader files
3907  shaderFiles = ri.FS_ListFiles( "scripts", ".shader", &numShaderFiles );
3908 
3909  if ( !shaderFiles || !numShaderFiles )
3910  {
3911  ri.Printf( PRINT_WARNING, "WARNING: no shader files found\n" );
3912  return;
3913  }
3914 
3915  if ( numShaderFiles > MAX_SHADER_FILES ) {
3916  numShaderFiles = MAX_SHADER_FILES;
3917  }
3918 
3919  // load and parse shader files
3920  for ( i = 0; i < numShaderFiles; i++ )
3921  {
3922  char filename[MAX_QPATH];
3923 
3924  Com_sprintf( filename, sizeof( filename ), "scripts/%s", shaderFiles[i] );
3925  ri.Printf( PRINT_DEVELOPER, "...loading '%s'\n", filename );
3926  summand = ri.FS_ReadFile( filename, (void **)&buffers[i] );
3927 
3928  if ( !buffers[i] )
3929  ri.Error( ERR_DROP, "Couldn't load %s", filename );
3930 
3931  // Do a simple check on the shader structure in that file to make sure one bad shader file cannot fuck up all other shaders.
3932  p = buffers[i];
3933  while(1)
3934  {
3935  token = COM_ParseExt(&p, qtrue);
3936 
3937  if(!*token)
3938  break;
3939 
3940  oldp = p;
3941 
3942  token = COM_ParseExt(&p, qtrue);
3943  if(token[0] != '{' && token[1] != '\0')
3944  {
3945  ri.Printf(PRINT_WARNING, "WARNING: Bad shader file %s has incorrect syntax.\n", filename);
3946  ri.FS_FreeFile(buffers[i]);
3947  buffers[i] = NULL;
3948  break;
3949  }
3950 
3951  SkipBracedSection(&oldp);
3952  p = oldp;
3953  }
3954 
3955 
3956  if (buffers[i])
3957  sum += summand;
3958  }
3959 
3960  // build single large buffer
3961  s_shaderText = ri.Hunk_Alloc( sum + numShaderFiles*2, h_low );
3962  s_shaderText[ 0 ] = '\0';
3963  textEnd = s_shaderText;
3964 
3965  // free in reverse order, so the temp files are all dumped
3966  for ( i = numShaderFiles - 1; i >= 0 ; i-- )
3967  {
3968  if ( !buffers[i] )
3969  continue;
3970 
3971  strcat( textEnd, buffers[i] );
3972  strcat( textEnd, "\n" );
3973  textEnd += strlen( textEnd );
3974  ri.FS_FreeFile( buffers[i] );
3975  }
3976 
3977  COM_Compress( s_shaderText );
3978 
3979  // free up memory
3980  ri.FS_FreeFileList( shaderFiles );
3981 
3982  Com_Memset(shaderTextHashTableSizes, 0, sizeof(shaderTextHashTableSizes));
3983  size = 0;
3984 
3985  p = s_shaderText;
3986  // look for shader names
3987  while ( 1 ) {
3988  token = COM_ParseExt( &p, qtrue );
3989  if ( token[0] == 0 ) {
3990  break;
3991  }
3992 
3993  hash = generateHashValue(token, MAX_SHADERTEXT_HASH);
3994  shaderTextHashTableSizes[hash]++;
3995  size++;
3996  SkipBracedSection(&p);
3997  }
3998 
3999  size += MAX_SHADERTEXT_HASH;
4000 
4001  hashMem = ri.Hunk_Alloc( size * sizeof(char *), h_low );
4002 
4003  for (i = 0; i < MAX_SHADERTEXT_HASH; i++) {
4004  shaderTextHashTable[i] = (char **) hashMem;
4005  hashMem = ((char *) hashMem) + ((shaderTextHashTableSizes[i] + 1) * sizeof(char *));
4006  }
4007 
4008  Com_Memset(shaderTextHashTableSizes, 0, sizeof(shaderTextHashTableSizes));
4009 
4010  p = s_shaderText;
4011  // look for shader names
4012  while ( 1 ) {
4013  oldp = p;
4014  token = COM_ParseExt( &p, qtrue );
4015  if ( token[0] == 0 ) {
4016  break;
4017  }
4018 
4019  hash = generateHashValue(token, MAX_SHADERTEXT_HASH);
4020  shaderTextHashTable[hash][shaderTextHashTableSizes[hash]++] = oldp;
4021 
4022  SkipBracedSection(&p);
4023  }
4024 
4025  return;
4026 
4027 }

4030 /*
4031 ====================
4032 CreateInternalShaders
4033 ====================
4034 */
4035 static void CreateInternalShaders( void ) {
4036  tr.numShaders = 0;
4037 
4038  // init the default shader
4039  Com_Memset( &shader, 0, sizeof( shader ) );
4040  Com_Memset( &stages, 0, sizeof( stages ) );
4041 
4042  Q_strncpyz( shader.name, "<default>", sizeof( shader.name ) );
4043 
4044  shader.lightmapIndex = LIGHTMAP_NONE;
4045  stages[0].bundle[0].image[0] = tr.defaultImage;
4046  stages[0].active = qtrue;
4047  stages[0].stateBits = GLS_DEFAULT;
4048  tr.defaultShader = FinishShader();
4049 
4050  // shadow shader is just a marker
4051  Q_strncpyz( shader.name, "<stencil shadow>", sizeof( shader.name ) );
4052  shader.sort = SS_STENCIL_SHADOW;
4053  tr.shadowShader = FinishShader();
4054 }
4055 
4056 static void CreateExternalShaders( void ) {
4057  tr.projectionShadowShader = R_FindShader( "projectionShadow", LIGHTMAP_NONE, qtrue );
4058  tr.flareShader = R_FindShader( "flareShader", LIGHTMAP_NONE, qtrue );
4059 
4060  // Hack to make fogging work correctly on flares. Fog colors are calculated
4061  // in tr_flare.c already.
4062  if(!tr.flareShader->defaultShader)
4063  {
4064  int index;
4065 
4066  for(index = 0; index < tr.flareShader->numUnfoggedPasses; index++)
4067  {
4068  tr.flareShader->stages[index]->adjustColorsForFog = ACFF_NONE;
4069  tr.flareShader->stages[index]->stateBits |= GLS_DEPTHTEST_DISABLE;
4070  }
4071  }
4072 
4073  tr.sunShader = R_FindShader( "sun", LIGHTMAP_NONE, qtrue );
4074 }

4076 /*

4080 */
4081 void R_InitShaders( void ) {

4084  Com_Memset(hashTable, 0, sizeof(hashTable));
4085 
4086  CreateInternalShaders();
4087 
4088  ScanAndLoadShaderFiles();
4089 
4090  CreateExternalShaders();
4091 }
